import { useState } from "react" import { signup } from "../../services/artists" function SignUp() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ artistName: "", username: "", password: "", passwordConfirm: "", artistStatement: "", image: "", }) const handleChange = (event) => setFormData({ ...formData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value, }); const handleSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault() await signup(formData) } return(
) } export default SignUp
